summary: A group of young people grow up together in a small, rural community in the Cotswolds.
cast: Rachel McIntyre|Emma Cooper|Liam McIlfatrick|Che Corr|Freddie Cunliffe|Jane Foxhall|Tara Ballard|Betty Bench|Frank Bench|Patricia Loveland|Byndley Hutt|Lillian Hutt|Kurt Taylor|Megan Palmer|Katie Samuels|Michael Socha|Mike Randle|Kerry Rowe|Hilary Davies|Oscar Leveburg|Edward Pinner
title: Better Things
